CHAT.comment: Book Reading; The Very Hungry Caterpillar
Chi and Mot sit on sofa Chi holds book

Chi starts out reading the book to herself and jokingly asks why when EXP says it has to be read out loud; Chi follows words with finger , reads quickly and fluently; Mot (the father actually) doesn't have to do anything

u.a: Chi starts to read book to herself
follows the words with her fingers (continues through book reading)
answring telephone , saying Chi is busy
on telephone saying that Chi is busy
